_sText:
DE_sand_blast_beta_6 this will be the final beta version so the next one released will be the final one. please let me know if you find any issues or any suggestions for changes . I reccomend having fast downloading set up if you are putting this on a server its about a 10 - 20 minute download with out it. changes since B3 - i added a new walk way - i removed a walkway - added a bit more to some of the surrounding buildings - better optimization (better fps) - added more detail - changed bomb site B - added some more props - removed some props - removed some trees - made game play more even - added some double doors - swapped a wall with some rocks near bomb site B - removed the water in ct spawn - made the breakable wall in bomb site a better - removed the displacements from the middle market area - broke up the straight line from t spawn through the market a little bit - fixed some displacements - i removed the displacement from t spawn - made the walk way from t spawn to bomb site A wider - i brightened bomb site B - removed the displacements near bomb site B - changed a bunch of props - i have changed bomb site A a lot - added smoke effect to the sky - i have changed and added to ct spawn - fixed places where you could jump out of the map - fixed some places so you cannot jump onto props - made it harder to throw grenades into bomb site A - i have removed the background sounds - opened some areas up for more room to move around Known problems - the displacement in t spawn is black and weird in one area map build by Mastergun displacements by wiked sick skybox texture by karatekafer nav file and radar overview coming with the final version
Watch more video games and play free games at WeGame.
